snippet.title: Filthy Animals - Official Heist Simulator Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Filthy Animals is available now on PC via Steam and Epic Games Store with crossplay support for PC. Watch the chaotic trailer for this co-op multiplayer heist simulator game for 1-4 players, where you take on the role of mutant animals on a crime spree. 

In Filthy Animals, take on the role of mutant animals following the orders of Tony, the Filthy Animal Bossman Criminal Mastermind. Wreak havoc through a series of heists starting with a convenience store and a bank robbery, then break into a super secret military base, with missions ranging all the way into outer space.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
